title: Valid Parentheses
description: Determine if an input string of parentheses `(`, `)`, `{`, `}`, `[`, `]` is valid. A string is valid if open brackets must be closed by the same type of brackets, and open brackets must be closed in the correct order. Must use a stack data structure.
constraints: Input string contains only the six types of parentheses.

examples.explanation: All brackets are opened and closed correctly.
The square bracket is closed before the curly brace is closed.

hints: Use a list (or stack) to store open brackets.
When a closing bracket is encountered, check if the top of the stack matches its corresponding opening bracket.
If the stack is empty at the end, the string is valid.
